description: A program to find the convex hull, or perform a Delaunay triangulation of a set of points.

isorange.title: Isorange
isorange.description: Create isosurface where V0 <= volume < V1

isocmask.title: Isocmask
isocmask.description: Create isosurface where MASK_COM != 0. Example: -isocmask '-a VOL+orig -expr (1-bool(a-V))' is equivalent to using -isoval V. NOTE: Allowed only with -xform mask

xform.title: Transform
xform.description: Transform to apply to volume values before searching for sign change boundary. Options: mask, shift, none

surf_vol.title: Surface volume
surf_vol.description: Specify a surface volume which contains a transform to apply to the surface node coordinates

input_1d.title: Input 1D
input_1d.description: Construct the triangulation of the points contained in 1D file XYZ. Use AFNI's [] selectors to specify the XYZ columns.

q_opt.title: Q option
q_opt.description: Meshing option OPT. Options: convex_hull, triangulate_xy

proj_xy.title: Project XY
proj_xy.description: Project points onto plane whose normal is the third principal component. Then rotate projection so that plane is parallel to Z = constant.

orig_coord.title: Original Coordinates
orig_coord.description: Use original coordinates when writing surface, not transformed ones.

these_coords.title: Coordinates
these_coords.description: Use coordinates in COORDS.1D when writing surface.

output_prefix.title: Output prefix
output_prefix.description: Prefix of output surface. Specifies the format and prefix of the surface.

novolreg.title: Ignore transformations
novolreg.description: Ignore any Rotate, Volreg, Tagalign, or WarpDrive transformations present in the Surface Volume.

setenv.title: Set environment variable
setenv.description: Set environment variable ENVname to be ENVvalue.
